entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:54 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 9:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: N 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 9:05 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 9:05 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
